entry.title: Fractional derviatives
entry.content:
This is the one of best videos I've seen on about fractional derivatives. Maybe there are applications for taylor series style approximation.

What Lies Between a Function and Its Derivative? (SoME2) | Fractional Calculus - YouTube

.. youtube:: 2dwQUUDt5Is

entry.title: Math announcer
entry.content: It would be great if there was a math expert watching me do math so it could tell me that mistakes I make as I make them instead of going down long detour of errors.

entry.title: Presentation order of Prof. Mattuck
entry.summary:
Lec 3 | MIT 18.03 Differential Equations, Spring 2006 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVzaX9u6YAE

First a diagram to cement the situation. Clearly label the variables and distinguish them, completely squash all false assumptions people have brewing in their heads.

$$T$$ is temperature, not time.

relate back to newton's …
entry.content:
Lec 3 | MIT 18.03 Differential Equations, Spring 2006 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=tVzaX9u6YAE

First a diagram to cement the situation. Clearly label the variables and distinguish them, completely squash all false assumptions people have brewing in their heads.

$$T$$ is temperature, not time.

relate back to newton's law of cooling

The heat flows from the outside to the inside. By convention the flow has a direction.

entry.title: Setting up a free blog on github
entry.summary:
In this blog post I'll describe how to set up a free math blog on github. We have to start somewhere. That means you are using a bash shell, have python installed and have a github account with ssh-keys configured, you might want to test that out.

10:29 $ ssh …
entry.content:
In this blog post I'll describe how to set up a free math blog on github. We have to start somewhere. That means you are using a bash shell, have python installed and have a github account with ssh-keys configured, you might want to test that out.

10:29 $ ssh -T git@github.com
Hi drhodes! You've successfully authenticated, but GitHub 
does not provide shell access.

Yay! If you get an error instead, then you'll have to debug your ssh configuration or set it up from scratch.

  • How to add youtube videos to the blog
  • https://pypi.org/project/pelican-youtube/

entry.title: Generating a good random rational function
entry.content:
from wikipedia:

A rational expression is any element of the field of fractions of the polynomial ring $F[X]$.
